channel.title: [Class Suggestion] The Florist/Gardener [BD/UNS Support]
channel.description:
**The Florist**- BD support **Poison Immunity (passive)**- Cannot get poisoned **Cure (Night 1)**- Heal a player of any poisoning -infinite uses **Nightshade Reserve (night 2)**- Poisons Target Player. Poison Takes 2 nights to kill. Will commit suicide if player killed by poison was a Blue Dragon. - 2 uses
Objective - Defeat the opposing faction and any neutrals that seek to do you harm
---------- **The Gardener**- Unseen Support **Poison immunity(passive)**- Cannot get poisoned **Nightshade(Day 1)**- Poison target player. Target Player will die in 2 days - 1 use **Gather Ingredients(night 1)**- Gathers 1 more use for Drowsy Dhalia- infinite uses (can only use every other night) **Drowsy Dhalia(night 2)**- Target Player Cannot Speak Or Vote anyone for treason- 1 use
Objective- Defeat any Blue Dragon and neutrals who oppose The unseen

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Florist/Gardener [BD/UNS Support]
item.dc:creator: Simon
item.description:
you dont have to though, it is your class

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Florist/Gardener [BD/UNS Support]
item.dc:creator: Simon
item.description:
how about:
2nd day ability, occupies target in 2 nights, and pierces immunity, the target is told, and it is healable, and gather ingredients gains a use for that
and give drowsy dhalia 2 uses, because otherwise, it kind of looks like a one-trick pony

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Florist/Gardener [BD/UNS Support]
item.dc:creator: Simon
item.description:
i’d say change it
being unable to vote or talk is nothing to scoff at

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Florist/Gardener [BD/UNS Support]
item.dc:creator: That_Bard
item.description:
i guess i’ll change it so they gather more drowsy dhalia’s or something

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Florist/Gardener [BD/UNS Support]
item.dc:creator: Simon
item.description:
generally support classes dont have unlimited kills. a good idea might be leaving the nightshade as-is, and instead of Gather Ingredients, give it an occupying poison, and change it to unseen offensive

also, how many uses does Drowsy Dhalia have? because infinite might be too powerful

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Florist/Gardener [BD/UNS Support]
item.dc:creator: Sketch
item.description:
Not sure we need a class that is almost strictly better than the Hunter.

Gardener is OP lol

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Florist/Gardener [BD/UNS Support]
item.dc:creator: That_Bard
item.description:
The Florist- BD support
Poison Immunity (passive)- Cannot get poisoned
Cure (Night 1)- Heal a player of any poisoning -infinite uses
Nightshade Reserve (night 2)- Poisons Target Player. Poison Takes 2 nights to kill. Will commit suicide if player killed by poison was a Blue Dragon. - 2 uses

Objective - Defeat the opposing faction and any neutrals that seek to do you harm

The Gardener- Unseen Support
Poison immunity(passive)- Cannot get poisoned
Nightshade(Day 1)- Poison target player. Target Player will die in 2 days - 1 use
Gather Ingredients(night 1)- Gathers 1 more use for Drowsy Dhalia- infinite uses (can only use every other night)
Drowsy Dhalia(night 2)- Target Player Cannot Speak Or Vote anyone for treason- 1 use

Objective- Defeat any Blue Dragon and neutrals who oppose The unseen

Read full topic
